author: nspiegelberg
msg: pulled version 6 of the patch for persist memstoreTS to disk
Passes all (without enabling the TestAcidGuarantees for Scan test)

author: nspiegelberg
msg: During DLS the splitLog thread would get stuck since a cluster
shutdown would be requested and all regionservers would shut down, but
the split log thread would still keep trying forever to split logs and
hence the master would never shut down.
1) Ran it on dev cluster and verified master shuts down

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Don't set watch after region is opened.
There is a race condition where after setting region to OPENED, RS will try to
on the Znode, and master will try to delete the ZNode.
CC: hbase-eng@lists, madhuvaidya, kranganathan, kannan, pkhemani

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Fix master startup when running on a single machine
As part of master failover unit test changes I removed public access from
HMaster.LocalHMaster, which broke local HBase startup (a pseudo-distributed
This is a quick fix. A more thorough fix would ideally add a unit test.
Go to localhost:60010 and verify that the master is up.
